string-array.name: INTRO_USB_CONNECTED_TEXT
string-array.item: You are currently connected over USB

string-array.name: INTRO_USB_NOT_CONNECTED_TEXT
string-array.item: Plug in USB to launch\n(Windows only)

string-array.item: You are currently connected over Wi-Fi

string-array.name: INTRO_WIFI_NOT_CONNECTED_TEXT
string-array.item: Touch the button to access\nMoto Phone Portal

string-array.name: INTRO_USB_CONNECTED_WIFI_TEXT
string-array.item: Enter this address into your PC browser
